100 template <class ParameterInterace>
101 void TParamsPtr<ParameterInterace>::Init(const IParamsSet* parameterSetPtr, const QByteArray& parameterId, bool I_IF_DEBUG(isObligatory))
102 {
103  if ((parameterSetPtr != NULL) && !parameterId.isEmpty()){
104  const iser::ISerializable* parameterPtr = parameterSetPtr->GetParameter(parameterId);
105 
106  BaseClass::SetPtr(dynamic_cast<const ParameterInterace*>(parameterPtr));
107 
108  I_IF_DEBUG(
109  if (!BaseClass::IsValid() && isObligatory){
110  iprm::IParamsSet::Ids existingParamIds = parameterSetPtr->GetParamIds();
111  QStringList existingIds;
112  for (iprm::IParamsSet::Ids::ConstIterator index = existingParamIds.constBegin(); index != existingParamIds.constEnd(); index++){
113  existingIds.push_back(*index);
114  }
115 
116  QString idList = existingIds.join(", ");
117 
118  if (parameterPtr == NULL){
119  qDebug("Parameter %s was not found in the parameter set. Following parameter IDs are registered: %s", qPrintable(parameterId), qPrintable(idList));
120  }
121  else{
122  qDebug("Parameter %s was found in the parameter set, but it doesn't implement the required interface: %s", qPrintable(parameterId), qPrintable(typeid(ParameterInterace).name()));
123  }
124  }
125  )
126  }
127  else{
128  BaseClass::Reset();
129  }
130 }
131 
132 
133 template <class ParameterInterace>
134 void TParamsPtr<ParameterInterace>::Init(
135  const IParamsSet* parameterSetPtr,
136  const icomp::TAttributeMember<icomp::CIdAttribute>& parameterIdAttribute,
137  const icomp::TReferenceMember<ParameterInterace>& defaultRef,
138  bool I_IF_DEBUG(isObligatory))
139 {
140  BaseClass::Reset();
141 
142  if (parameterSetPtr != NULL){
143  if (parameterIdAttribute.IsValid()){
144  const iser::ISerializable* paramPtr = parameterSetPtr->GetParameter(*parameterIdAttribute);
145  const ParameterInterace* paramImplPtr = dynamic_cast<const ParameterInterace*>(paramPtr);
146  BaseClass::SetPtr(paramImplPtr);
147 
148  I_IF_DEBUG(
149  if ((paramImplPtr == NULL) && (paramPtr != NULL)){
150  qDebug("Parameter %s in parameter set is not compatible, should be %s", qPrintable(*parameterIdAttribute), qPrintable(istd::CClassInfo::GetName<ParameterInterace>()));
151  }
152  )
153  }
154  }
155 
156  if (!BaseClass::IsValid() && defaultRef.IsValid()){
157  BaseClass::SetPtr(defaultRef.GetPtr());
158  }
159 
160  I_IF_DEBUG(
161  if (!BaseClass::IsValid() && isObligatory){
162  QString debugMessage;
163  if (parameterIdAttribute.IsValid()){
164  iprm::IParamsSet::Ids existingParamIds = parameterSetPtr->GetParamIds();
165  QStringList existingIds;
166  for (iprm::IParamsSet::Ids::ConstIterator index = existingParamIds.constBegin(); index != existingParamIds.constEnd(); index++){
167  existingIds.push_back(*index);
168  }
169 
170  QString idList = existingIds.join(", ");
171 
172  debugMessage = QString("Parameter %1 was not found in the parameter set and no default parameter is active. Following parameter IDs are registered: %2").arg(QString(*parameterIdAttribute)).arg(idList);
173  }
174  else{
175  debugMessage = QString("Parameter was not specified and no default parameter is active");
176  }
177 
178  qDebug(qPrintable(debugMessage));
179  }
180  )
181 }
182
